logic

Class Guard

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Character
      • logic.Guard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Drunken, Rookie, Suspicious

    public class Guard
extends Character
    This class represents a specific type of Character. This specific type is one of the Hero's enemies (currently present in the first level). The Guard has a predefined route that specifies its movements.
    Author:
    Jo√£o Vieira, Susana Lima
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • updateGuard

        public char updateGuard(boolean isReverse)
        If the Guard can move retrieves the next value of its route considering the route's orientation.
        Parameters:
        isReverse - true if the route is to be done in the reverse sense, false otherwise
        Returns:
        the next value of this Guard route
